version_description:
Hey everyone! 3 Tiles has just got some juicy updates! These include new levels with new board combinations and puzzles.
In addition to new puzzles, there is some minor performance boost. Plus, we’ve enhanced the game’s overall stability. It’s just the perfect time to jump in and match some tiles!
Your constant support and feedback help us to become better every day. Feel free to share your feelings and opinions with us. You can always contact us at info@liftapp.by.

Hey everyone! 3 Tiles has just got some juicy updates! These include new levels with new board combinations and puzzles.
In addition to new puzzles, there is some minor performance boost. Plus, we’ve enhanced the game’s overall stability. It’s just the perfect time to jump in and match some tiles!
Your constant support and feedback help us to become better every day. Feel free to share your feelings and opinions with us. You can always contact us at info@liftapp.by.

Hey everyone! 3 Tiles has just got some juicy updates! These include new levels with new board combinations and puzzles.
In addition to new puzzles, there is some minor performance boost. Plus, we’ve enhanced the game’s overall stability. It’s just the perfect time to jump in and match some tiles!
Your constant support and feedback help us to become better every day. Feel free to share your feelings and opinions with us. You can always contact us at info@liftapp.by.

- Bug fixes
- Performance and stability improvements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at info@liftapp.by.

- New Flower theme and levels. Feel the blossom of the joy!
- New bonuses for returning players
- New feature - stack zone increase! Get a +1 tile slot by watching an ad. It will be available for one level.
- Bug fixes
- Performance and stability improvements

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at info@liftapp.by.
